citations.narrative:
At time of inspection, the facility representative stated that there was no formal training plan in place for personnel on the
contingency plan. Lack of training for personnel that have responsibilities outlined in the contingency plan can lead to
preventable losses. The facility must provide training for its personnel regarding their roles and responsibilities as outlined
in the plan.
Correct by training responsible personnel on their duties outlined in the contingency plan by 23 August 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC representative.
n

narrative:
2.38(l)(3) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
At time of inspection, the facility representative stated that there was no formal training plan in place for personnel on the 
contingency plan. Lack of training for personnel that have responsibilities outlined in the contingency plan can lead to 
preventable losses. The facility must provide training for its personnel regarding their roles and responsibilities as outlined 
in the plan. 
 
Correct by training responsible personnel on their duties outlined in the contingency plan by 23 August 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC representative.
